title: Easily analyze the file contents of Shiny apps
text: basic example shows solve common problem looping directory contains server files:
code: library(shinyfa) library(dplyr)    file_path_df <- list.files("SHINY-SERVER-DIRECTORY",                             pattern = "\\.R$", full.names = TRUE)  file_analysis <- data.frame()  # Initialize an empty dataframe  for (file in file_path_df) {   shiny_analysis <- analyze_shiny_reactivity(file_path = file)      # Skip if NULL (empty file or only `source()` calls)   if (is.null(shiny_analysis)) next      # Add filename column   shiny_analysis$file_name <- basename(file)      # Bind results   file_analysis <- bind_rows(file_analysis, shiny_analysis) }  print(file_analysis)
